name: Sky Showdown
description:
When we were kids, we pretended the floor was lava.

In this two-player combat game, the (very unstable) floor is floating on water, but this is magical water floating in the sky so it's equally deadly.

Aim of the game

Push the other player into the water without falling off yourself. Points are scored when the other player touches the water.

You can control the punch of each fist individually.  Powerups will randomly appear on the map; collect these to gain faster running speed and stronger fists for a limited time.

Aim of the game, really

There are 3 playing modes:
Countdown: Score as many points as possible in the space of 5 minutes.
Battle Royale: The first player to touch the water loses. If no one touches the water within 1 minute, both players lose (as per Battle Royale guidelines, there can be at most 1 winner).
Tie Breaker: The first player to lead by at least 3 points wins, with no time limit.

Controls

See Unity's default Graphics&Controls dialogue which appears at the beginning to customise controls. By default, Player 1 (Blue) moves with WASD, jumps with space, and punches with C and V; Player 2 (Red) moves with arrow keys, jumps with right ctrl, and punches with , and ..

This game was created for Search for a Star 2018.
